text:
The resolution authorizing submission of the proposed revenue bond issue may include any purpose authorized by the Revenue Bond Law of 1941, as it read, including amendments, on June 5, 1984, and may include any or all expenses incidental to such purpose or connected therewith and may include any combination of two or more such purposes. 
(Added by Ord. 12-00, File No. 992117, App. 2/11/2000)

heading.catch_text: STATEMENT OF PURPOSE; INCIDENTAL EXPENSES; DISCRETION.
